options.brightness: Change brightness for the built-in display
options.contrast: Change contrast for the built-in display
options.saturation: Change saturation for the built-in display
options.screen-battery-power: On battery power, turn off after
options.screen-charged-power: When plugged in, turn off after
options.screen-battery-sleep: On battery power, PC goes to sleep after
options.screen-charged-sleep: When plugged in, PC goes to sleep after
options.clipboard-notice: When you copy or cut something in Tini, it's copied to the clipboard for you to paste.
options.clipboard-history-notice: Save multiple items to the clipboard to use later. Press the windows logo key + V to view your clipboard history and paste from it.
options.clipboard-clear-info: Clear all clipboard data on this device

options.accent: Show accent color on the following surfaces
options.start-all-programs: Show all programs in Start menu
options.taskbar-peek: Use Peek to preview the desktop when you move your mouse to the Show desktop button at the end of the taskbar
options.taskbar-preview-hover: Hover previews slightly above the taskbar

options.apps-notice: If you would like to uninstall or move an app, select it from this list.
options.startup-notice: Apps can be configured  to start when you log in. n most cases apps will start minimied or may only start a background task.

options.language-display-notice: Tini features like Settings and File Explorer will appear in this language
